import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom'; import "./DashBoard.css"; export default function DashBoard(){ const [email,setEmail]=useState(null); const handleClick=()=>{ localStorage.removeItem("email"); } useEffect(() => { setEmail(localStorage.getItem("email")); }, [email]) return email!==null?(
